FS.title: Eng. Sergio Mercado
FS.content: I am Sergio Mercado, System Engineer with B2 english level, i work as web developer focused on good practices and agile methodologies to provide quality results.

AM.title: About me
AM.content_One: Hi, I'm Sergio Mercado Galarza, 26 years old, and I'm from Bolivia, I studied Systems Engineering at Domingo Savio Private University and also English at Bolivian American Center (CBA).
AM.content_Two: Over the years, I had worked with different tecnologies, mostly on monetized personal projects, I have also worked on SEO for blogs and Youtube channels.
AM.content_Three: One of my biggest goals is to be able to dedicate myself full-time to my greatest passion, 'Web Development'.
